name: LEGENDARY BEAN RACER
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2018 by JoJo Lu
Theme: Transmission
note: the mac build may or may not run, I have no idea.

This game was designed to be played with 3 people, but you can still play it with 2 people, or just by yourself if you want :-) The rules are simple: collect beans to increase the rate of transmission of abdominal gas to speed up, and avoid spikes.

Controls:
Player 1 : W / S
Player 2 : H / N
Player 3 : UP / DOWN
ENTER : to skip the epilogue, or to continue through the post game screens
You can also change the controls to your liking in the Unity player.

P. S. You can change your character's colour, try using your controls on the title screen! :-)
